players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Oh no, Diana is dead! I was hoping she was the detective. We need to be careful and figure this out together."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I am the detective! I investigated Bob last night and he is mafioso. He's trying to frame me to save himself."
Bob: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and he is mafioso. Alice, please trust me and vote for Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
